name: vroom - physics car controller
description:
vroom is a simple physics-based vehicles controller.

This page features a demo scene made with vroom.


Vroom currently features : 

  • Animation curves inputs for acceleration and tires grip when slipping
  •  Vehicles with more or less than 4 wheels
  • Skidmarks for drifting
  • Highly customizable
  • Suspensions
  • Drifting (Obviously)

This is my very first asset, it might be very awful, you've been warned.

  • WA - Accelerate / Brake
  • AD - Steering
  • R - Reset car 
Check out my YouTube channel!
